features.featureName: Microsoft Defender for Service / Product Offering
features.featureDescription: Service has an offering-specific Microsoft Defender solution to monitor and alert on security issues.
features.featureGuidance: Microsoft Defender for Cloud detects anomalous activities indicating unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit databases. To get alerts from the Microsoft Defender plan you'll first need to enable it.

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Defender for open-source relational databases should be enabled
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Azure Defender for open-source relational databases detects anomalous activities indicating unusual and potentially harmful attempts to access or exploit databases. Learn more about the capabilities of Azure Defender for open-source relational databases at https://aka.ms/AzDforOpenSourceDBsDocu. Important: Enabling this plan will result in charges for protecting your open-source relational databases. Learn about the pricing on Security Center's pricing page: https://aka.ms/pricing-security-center
